verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> over שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> unto Samuel עַד־ <WH5704> long מָתַי֙ <WH4970> How אַתָּה֙ <WH859> will you מִתְאַבֵּ֣ל <WH56> How long wilt thou mourn אֶל־ <WH413> over שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> for Saul וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I מְאַסְתִּ֔יו <WH3988> seeing I have rejected מִמְּלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> him from reigning עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel מַלֵּ֨א <WH4390> accomplish קַרְנְךָ֜ <WH7161> thine horn שֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> with oil וְלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> and go אֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֙ <WH7971> I will send אֶל־ <WH413> over יִשַׁ֣י <WH3448> thee to Jesse בֵּֽית־ הַלַּחְמִ֔י <WH1022> the Bethlehemite כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָאִ֧יתִי <WH7200> for I have provided בְּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> among his sons לִ֖י מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> me a king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How אֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> along וְשָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hear שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> ? if Saul וַהֲרָגָ֑נִי <WH2026> [it] he will kill ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> me And the LORD עֶגְלַ֤ת <WH5697> A heifer בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> bull תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> Take בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> with thee וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say לִזְבֹּ֥חַ <WH2076> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to the LORD בָּֽאתִי׃ <WH935> I am come

וְקָרָ֥אתָ <WH7121> And call לְיִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> Jesse בַּזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> to the sacrifice וְאָֽנֹכִ֗י <WH595> and I אוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֙ <WH3045> and I will shew אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> what תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> thee what thou shalt do וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <WH4886> and thou shalt anoint לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אֹמַ֖ר <WH559> unto me [him] whom I name אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that which the LORD וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem וַיֶּחֶרְד֞וּ <WH2729> trembled זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> And the elders הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the town לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <WH7122> to meet וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said שָׁלֹ֥ם <WH7965> favor בּוֹאֶֽךָ׃ <WH935> Comest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> And he said שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> Peaceably לִזְבֹּ֤חַ <WH2076> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD בָּ֔אתִי <WH935> I am come הִֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <WH6942> sanctify וּבָאתֶ֥ם <WH935> yourselves and come אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for בַּזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> with me to the sacrifice וַיְקַדֵּ֤שׁ <WH6942> And he sanctified אֶת־ <WH853> יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> Jesse וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called לָהֶ֖ם לַזָּֽבַח׃ <WH2077> them to the sacrifice

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become בְּבוֹאָ֔ם <WH935> And it came to pass when they were come וַיַּ֖רְא <WH7200> that he looked אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִיאָ֑ב <WH446> on Eliab וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said אַ֛ךְ <WH389> Surely נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> is before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Surely the LORD'S מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <WH4899> anointed

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> But the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> unto Samuel אַל־ <WH408> not תַּבֵּ֧ט <WH5027> Look אֶל־ <WH413> at מַרְאֵ֛הוּ <WH4758> not on his countenance וְאֶל־ <WH413> to גְּבֹ֥הַּ <WH1364> or on the height קוֹמָת֖וֹ <WH6967> of his stature כִּ֣י <WH3588> because מְאַסְתִּ֑יהוּ <WH3988> because I have refused כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> because לֹ֗א <WH3808> not אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יִרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> seeth הָאָדָ֔ם <WH120> him for [the LORD seeth] not as man כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> for man יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> looketh לַעֵינַ֔יִם <WH5869> on the outward appearance וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> but the LORD יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> looketh לַלֵּבָֽב׃ <WH3824> on the heart

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> Then Jesse אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <WH41> Abinadab וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖הוּ <WH5674> and made him pass לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said גַּם־ <WH1571> either בָּזֶ֖ה <WH2088> this לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not בָחַ֥ר <WH977> chosen יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Neither hath the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> to pass by יִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> Then Jesse שַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8048> made Shammah וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said גַּם־ <WH1571> either בָּזֶ֖ה <WH2088> this לֹא־ <WH3808> has not בָחַ֥ר <WH977> chosen יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Neither hath the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> to pass יִשַׁ֛י <WH3448> Again Jesse שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> made seven בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשַׁ֔י <WH3448> unto Jesse לֹא־ <WH3808> has not בָחַ֥ר <WH977> hath not chosen יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD בָּאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשַׁי֮ <WH3448> unto Jesse הֲתַ֣מּוּ <WH8552> Are here all הַנְּעָרִים֒ <WH5288> babe וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> said ע֚וֹד <WH5750> yet שָׁאַ֣ר <WH7604> There remaineth הַקָּטָ֔ן <WH6996> yet the youngest וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold רֹעֶ֖ה <WH7462> and behold he keepeth בַּצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> the sheep וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> unto Jesse שִׁלְחָ֣ה <WH7971> Send וְקָחֶ֔נּוּ <WH3947> and fetch כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> we will not נָסֹ֖ב <WH5437> him for we will not sit down עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּא֥וֹ <WH935> till he come פֹֽה׃ <WH6311> hither

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> And he sent וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> and brought him in וְה֣וּא <WH1931> now he אַדְמוֹנִ֔י <WH132> Now he [was] ruddy עִם־ <WH5973> [and] withal יְפֵ֥ה <WH3303> of a beautiful עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> countenance וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> and goodly רֹ֑אִי <WH7210> to look to פ וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD ק֥וּם <WH6965> Arise מְשָׁחֵ֖הוּ <WH4886> anoint כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> Then Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> קֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> the horn הַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> of oil וַיִּמְשַׁ֣ח <WH4886> and anointed אֹתוֹ֮ <WH853> בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> him in the midst אֶחָיו֒ <WH251> of his brethren וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <WH6743> came רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> and the Spirit יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> upon דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> upon David מֵהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> forward וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> So Samuel וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went הָרָמָֽתָה׃ <WH7414> to Ramah ס

וְר֧וּחַ <WH7307> But the Spirit יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD סָ֖רָה <WH5493> departed מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> from Saul וּבִֽעֲתַ֥תּוּ <WH1204> troubled רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> spirit רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> and an evil מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> from the LORD

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> servants שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> And Saul's אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֧א <WH4994> now רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> spirit אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> from God רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> unto him Behold now an evil מְבַעִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH1204> troubleth

יֹאמַר־ <WH559> now command נָ֤א <WH4994> now אֲדֹנֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH113> Let our lord עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> thy servants לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> [which are] before יְבַקְשׁ֕וּ <WH1245> thee to seek out אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> a man יֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> [who is] a cunning מְנַגֵּ֣ן <WH5059> player בַּכִּנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> on an harp וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come בִּֽהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> shall come עָלֶ֤יךָ <WH5921> and רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> from God רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> and it shall come to pass when the evil וְנִגֵּ֥ן <WH5059> is upon thee that he shall play בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> with his hand וְט֥וֹב <WH2895> and thou shalt be well לָֽךְ׃ פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> unto his servants רְאוּ־ <WH7200> Provide נָ֣א <WH4994> now לִ֗י אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> me now a man מֵיטִ֣יב <WH3190> well לְנַגֵּ֔ן <WH5059> that can play וַהֲבִיאוֹתֶ֖ם <WH935> and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> then

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> Then answered אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> one מֵהַנְּעָרִ֜ים <WH5288> of the servants וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold רָאִ֜יתִי <WH7200> Behold I have seen בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> a son לְיִשַׁי֮ <WH3448> of Jesse בֵּ֣ית הַלַּחְמִי֒ <WH1022> the Bethlehemite יֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> [that is] cunning נַ֠גֵּן <WH5059> in playing וְגִבּ֨וֹר <WH1368> and a mighty חַ֜יִל <WH2428> valiant man וְאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> and a man מִלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> of war וּנְב֥וֹן <WH995> and prudent דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> in matters וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> person תֹּ֑אַר <WH8389> and a comely וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> Wherefore Saul מַלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> unto Jesse וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said שִׁלְחָ֥ה <WH7971> Send אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> me David בִּנְךָ֖ <WH1121> thy son אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בַּצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> which [is] with the sheep

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took יִשַׁ֜י <WH3448> And Jesse חֲמ֥וֹר <WH2543> an ass לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> [laden] with bread וְנֹ֣אד <WH4997> and a bottle יַ֔יִן <WH3196> of wine וּגְדִ֥י <WH1423> young עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> goat אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and a וַיִּשְׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> and sent בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [them] by דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> David בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> unto Saul

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came דָוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> to Saul וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וַיֶּאֱהָבֵ֣הֽוּ <WH157> him and he loved מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> him greatly וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֖וֹ נֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> bearer כֵלִֽים׃ <WH3627> his armor

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> to Jesse לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יַעֲמָד־ <WH5975> I pray thee stand נָ֤א <WH4994> now דָוִד֙ <WH1732> Let David לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָ֥צָא <WH4672> me for he hath found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> in my sight

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came בִּֽהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> came רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> And it came to pass when the [evil] spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> from God אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> was upon Saul וְלָקַ֥ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> that David אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּנּ֖וֹר <WH3658> an harp וְנִגֵּ֣ן <WH5059> and played בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> with his hand וְרָוַ֤ח <WH7304> was refreshed לְשָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> so Saul וְט֣וֹב <WH2895> and was well ל֔וֹ וְסָ֥רָה <WH5493> departed מֵעָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> and the evil פ
